item.title: Enhancing Map Visualizations in Leaflet with Custom Markers and Colors in R
item.description: Leaflet is one of the best open-source JavaScript libraries for map visualizations, and its integration with R is excellent; however, only one minor detail bordering me, the limitation of 19 colours for the markers, besides the exhaustive way to map each value to each icon and colour.
